consent.title: Do you want to get your TEC Guardian credential?
consent.instructions: This credential verifies your role as a Guardian within The Elidoras Codex ecosystem, granting access to advanced knowledge systems and collaborative research tools.

steps: 1. Create a TEC logo/sigil SVG and host at elidorascodex.com/assets/tec-sigil.svg
2. In Azure Portal > Azure Active Directory > Verifiable Credentials > Create credential
3. Copy the displayDefinition JSON into the Display definition field
4. Copy the rulesDefinition JSON into the Rules definition field
5. Configure the ID token mappings in your identity provider to include extension attributes
6. Test issuance with a sample user
notes.placeholderLogo: For now, use a simple geometric design or text-based logo until the official TEC sigil is ready
